nodes.text: The Binary Bar was a tavern located in the Ven-Kav region of the planet Venaari. One of the bar's most popular drinks was the Angerian Fishak Surprise.[source?]

Corellian gambler Cohden K'Reye was a regular at the bar, and it was one of his favorite hang-outs for inspiring creativity. On one occasion, K'Reye was accosted by a surly Barabel while creating a tour guide to the galaxy's cantinas, and paused to take care of the trouble-maker before resuming his work.
